FuncDef: This command configures an IPv6 filter ID that is applied to packets egressing the IES R-VPLS interface. The filter overrides existing egress IPv6 filter applied to VPLS service endpoints such as SAPs or SDPs, if configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 filter ID. This parameter is required when executing the v6-routed-override-filter command. The specified filter ID must exist as an IPv6 filter within the system or the override command fails.
